page.title: 11LOCAL ISSUES
page.content: The following issues are of great concern to many of the local residents {Second Homes:}This area is frequently chosen by people who want to buy a 2nd home.As many as{16%}are 2nd homes. People seek the tranquillity, invigorating weather, close proximity to the sea, the character of the old_ fashioned market town of{Southwold}and the heritage coastline which is a good area for walking and Botany.This creates many problems and, although it generates business, it inflates house prices, making it more difficult for local people to buy homes,and drives young people away from the area. The lack of low_cost housing thus caused, means that many people employed here have to live outside the area, wasting money on transport. It also discourages people from working in the area as costs of transport are high.
